name: MeasureLatency
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: measure latency
des:
Measure Latency will calculate the time between an Echo Button press and the information arriving in the cloud for processing. It is a relative measure of the speed of your Internet connection, as it includes some Alexa communications. Multiple button presses are combined to calculate an average.
Please note that Amazon no longer sells the Echo Button device, so if you don't have one, you can't use this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
